assertion: Identity and access controls enforce least privilege, phishing-resistant MFA, and secure federation using SAML for all users.
description: The system uses IAM Permission Sets and SCPs to enforce role-based access and prevent privilege escalation. SAML-based login enforces account federation with strong password policies and multi-factor authentication (MFA) via TOTP. All users are authenticated through Okta FedRAMP cell, and access is monitored and logged through CloudTrail.
source_system: AWS IAM Identity Center (SSO), Okta FedRAMP Cell, IAM Roles and Permission Sets, SCPs
validation_method: User accounts and permissions validated via Okta admin console and AWS IAM Identity Center. MFA status verified via Okta policy. IAM policies reviewed via Terraform plan and AWS console exports.
failure_condition: If MFA is disabled for any active account, password complexity is not enforced, or if IAM permission sets grant more than required privileges without justification or review.
